text: (appotu) avarkal, "ivan (atait) tirutiyiruntal ivanutaiya cakotaran (yusuhpum) munnal niccayamaka tirutiyirukkiran" enru (tankalukkul) kurikkontarkal; (icceytikalaic ceviyerrum) avarkalitam veliyitatu yusuhp tam manatukkul maraittu vaittuk kontar; avar"ninkal tarattil innum tiyavarkal; (ivar cakotararum tirutiyiruppar enru) ninkal varnikkirirkale atai allah nanraka arivan" enru (tamakkulle) collik kontar
